cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gaikou

sentence.kanji: 政府は外交に力を入れているの。
sentence.romaji: seifu ha gaikou ni chikara wo irete iru no
sentence.english: The government is making efforts in diplomacy.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ashikubi

sentence.kanji: 彼は足首を痛めています。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ashikubi wo itamete imasu
sentence.english: He has hurt his ankle.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oidasu

sentence.kanji: 彼は家から追い出された。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ie kara oidasareta
sentence.english: He was kicked out from his home.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oikakeru

sentence.kanji: パトカーがバイクを追いかけてるぞ。
sentence.romaji: patoka- ga baiku wo oikakete ru zo
sentence.english: The police car is chasing the motorbike.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuika

sentence.kanji: オーダーを追加しました。
sentence.romaji: o-da- wo tsuika shimashita
sentence.english: I made an additional order.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hikaku

sentence.kanji: 去年の売り上げと比較しましょう。
sentence.romaji: kyonen no uriage to hikaku shimashou
sentence.english: Let's compare it with last year's sales.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kairo

sentence.kanji: コンピュータの電子回路が故障した。
sentence.romaji: konpyu-ta no denshi kairo ga koshou shita
sentence.english: The computer's electric circuits have broken down.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koukan

sentence.kanji: 試合の相手とユニフォームを交換したよ。
sentence.romaji: shiai no aite to yunifuo-mu wo koukan shita yo
sentence.english: We exchanged uniforms with the opposing team at the match.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koutai

sentence.kanji: 家まで交替で荷物を持ちました。
sentence.romaji: ie made koutai de nimotsu wo mochimashita
sentence.english: We took turns carrying the luggage to the house.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kouryuu

sentence.kanji: もっと他の町との交流を深めましょう。
sentence.romaji: moto hoka no machi to no kouryuu wo fukamemashou
sentence.english: Let's strengthen our ties with other towns.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hikakuteki

sentence.kanji: 今年は比較的景気がいい。
sentence.romaji: kotoshi ha hikakuteki keiki ga ii
sentence.english: Business is comparatively good this year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oshie

sentence.kanji: 父の教えは「自分に厳しく」です。
sentence.romaji: chichi no oshie ha jibun ni kibishiku desu
sentence.english: My father told me to be strict with myself.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zansho

sentence.kanji: 今年も残暑が厳しかった。
sentence.romaji: kotoshi mo zansho ga kibishikata
sentence.english: The late-summer heat was harsh this year, too.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ayamachi

sentence.kanji: 同じ過ちを繰り返さないことだ。
sentence.romaji: onaji ayamachi wo kurikaesanai koto da
sentence.english: Do not repeat the same mistake.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shouhisha

sentence.kanji: この法律は消費者を守るためのものです。
sentence.romaji: kono houritsu ha shouhisha wo mamoru tame no mono desu
sentence.english: This law is used to defend the consumer.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nesugosu

sentence.kanji: うっかり寝過ごしてしまったんだ。
sentence.romaji: ukari nesugoshite shimata n da
sentence.english: I accidentally overslept.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's osowaru

sentence.kanji: 私は両親から多くを教わりました。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha ryoushin kara ooku wo osowarimashita
sentence.english: I learned a lot from my parents.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ryousha

sentence.kanji: 両者の意見を聞きましょう。
sentence.romaji: ryousha no iken wo kikimashou
sentence.english: Let's hear both parties' opinions.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hokousha

sentence.kanji: 歩行者は道の右側を歩いてください。
sentence.romaji: hokousha ha michi no migigawa wo aruite kudasai
sentence.english: Pedestrians must walk on the right side of the road.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oitsuku

sentence.kanji: 駅でようやく彼に追い付きました。
sentence.romaji: eki de youyaku kare ni oitsukimashita
sentence.english: I finally caught up with him at the station.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ashimoto

sentence.kanji: 暗いので足下に気を付けてください。
sentence.romaji: kurai no de ashimoto ni ki wo tsukete kudasai
sentence.english: Please watch your step in the dark.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuketasu

sentence.kanji: 何か付け足すことはありますか。
sentence.romaji: nanika tsuketasu koto ha arimasu ka
sentence.english: Is there anything to add?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuishin

sentence.kanji: 追伸、お兄さんはお元気ですか。
sentence.romaji: tsuishin oniisan ha ogenki desu ka
sentence.english: P.S. How is your older brother?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chouka

sentence.kanji: この荷物は重量超過です。
sentence.romaji: kono nimotsu ha juuryou chouka desu
sentence.english: This luggage is overweight.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oinuku

sentence.kanji: リレーで彼は2人追い抜いたね。
sentence.romaji: rire- de kare ha futari oinuita ne
sentence.english: He overtook two people in the relay.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kansha

sentence.kanji: 家族に感謝しています。
sentence.romaji: kazoku ni kansha shite imasu
sentence.english: I am grateful to my family.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gesha

sentence.kanji: 先生に月謝を渡しましたか。
sentence.romaji: sensei ni gesha wo watashimashita ka
sentence.english: Did you give the monthly fee to the teacher?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sasu

sentence.kanji: 今日は久しぶりに日が射してるね。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha hisashiburi ni hi ga sashite ru ne
sentence.english: The sun is shining today for the first time in a long time.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hansha

sentence.kanji: 車のライトが反射していますね。
sentence.romaji: kuruma no raito ga hansha shite imasu ne
sentence.english: Car lights are being reflected.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's katei

sentence.kanji: プログラムの過程に問題があるの。
sentence.romaji: puroguramu no katei ni mondai ga aru no
sentence.english: There is a problem in the programming process.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zensha

sentence.kanji: 私は前者の方が優れていると思います。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha zensha no hou ga sugurete iru to omoimasu
sentence.english: I think that the former is excellent.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shushin

sentence.kanji: 家内は九州出身です。
sentence.romaji: kanai ha kyuushuu shushin desu
sentence.english: My wife is from Kyushu.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinshin

sentence.kanji: 私は心身共に疲れていました。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha shinshin tomoni tsukarete imashita
sentence.english: I was mentally and physically tired.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mi

sentence.kanji: 旅行中は身の安全が第一です。
sentence.romaji: ryokouchuu ha mi no anzen ga daiichi desu
sentence.english: Personal safety is paramount while traveling.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nakami

sentence.kanji: かばんの中身を見せてください。
sentence.romaji: kaban no nakami wo misete kudasai
sentence.english: Please show me the contents of the bag.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mijika

sentence.kanji: 私にとって動物は身近な存在です。
sentence.romaji: watashi ni tote doubutsu ha mijika na sonzai desu
sentence.english: I feel very close to animals.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's minomawari

sentence.kanji: 身の回りのお世話は私がします。
sentence.romaji: minomawari no osewa ha watashi ga shimasu 。
sentence.english: I'll take care of things for you.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's minari

sentence.kanji: 身なりのいい人が入ってきた。
sentence.romaji: minari no ii hito ga haite kita
sentence.english: A well-dressed person came in.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kougo

sentence.kanji: 男女交互に並んでください。
sentence.romaji: danjo kougo ni narande kudasai
sentence.english: Please make a line of boy girl boy girl.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sakusha

sentence.kanji: この本の作者は誰ですか。
sentence.romaji: kono hon no sakusha ha dare desu ka
sentence.english: Who is the author of this book?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hogosha

sentence.kanji: 私はこの子の保護者です。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha kono ko no hogosha desu
sentence.english: I'm this child's guardian.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinro

sentence.kanji: 卒業後の進路を迷っています。
sentence.romaji: sotsugyou go no shinro wo mayote imasu
sentence.english: I'm having trouble deciding what path I'll take after graduation.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jishin

sentence.kanji: 自分自身を疑ってはいけません。
sentence.romaji: jibun jishin wo utagate ha ikemasen
sentence.english: Don't doubt yourself.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ichijirushii

sentence.kanji: 彼の成長は著しいです。
sentence.romaji: kare no seichou ha ichijirushii desu
sentence.english: His progress is remarkable.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's arawasu

sentence.kanji: この本では自然の大切さがよく著されているよ。
sentence.romaji: kono hon de ha shizen no taisetsusa ga yoku arawasarete iru yo
sentence.english: The importance of nature is well written in this book.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chosha

sentence.kanji: この本の著者はイギリス人です。
sentence.romaji: kono hon no chosha ha igirisujin desu
sentence.english: The author of this book is British.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chosho

sentence.kanji: 彼の新しい著書が出版されたね。
sentence.romaji: kare no atarashii chosho ga shupan sareta ne
sentence.english: His new book was published.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kikime

sentence.kanji: この薬の効き目は素晴らしいの。
sentence.romaji: kono kusuri no kikime ha subarashii no
sentence.english: This medicine is so effective.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koutei

sentence.kanji: 陸上部は校庭で練習しています。
sentence.romaji: rikujoubu ha koutei de renshuu shite imasu
sentence.english: A track club is practicing in the schoolyard.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keikan

sentence.kanji: 道で警官に呼び止められた。
sentence.romaji: michi de keikan ni yobitomerareta
sentence.english: I was stopped by a policeman on the road.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kosetsu

sentence.kanji: 彼女はスキーで足を骨折したの。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha suki- de ashi wo kosetsu shita no
sentence.english: She fractured her foot while skiing.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's katsuyaku

sentence.kanji: 彼の活躍で優勝したよ。
sentence.romaji: kare no katsuyaku de yuushou shita yo
sentence.english: His performance led us to win the tournament.
